lines.gurmukhi: gurisK eykmyk rom mihmw AnMq Agm Apwr gur mihmw inDwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Gursikh Aykamayk Rom Mahimaa Ananta , Agam Apaar Gur Mahimaa Nidhaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By virtue of inexhaustible toil of Naam Simran in the service of a True Guru, the praise of a hair of a Gursikh is infinite. Then the inaccessible Satguru with countless virtues is a treasure house of praises.

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK eykmyk bol ko n qol mol sRI gur sbd Agimiq igAwn iDAwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Gursikh Aykamayk Bol Ko N Tol Mola , Sree Gur Sabad Agamiti Giaan Dhiaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Those who obey the commands of their True Guru; those who are one with their Guru; their words are beyond evaluation. Then the divine words of a True Guru, his Gyan (knowledge) and reflection on his precepts is beyond comprehension.

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK eykmyk diRsit diRsit qwrY sRI gur ktwC kiRpw ko n prmwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Gursikh Aykamayk Drisati Drisati Taarai , Sree Gur Kataachh Kripaa Ko N Paramaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When one who is in harmony with True Guru, who meditates on His name, his one glimpse is good enough to sail the recipient across the ocean. Then the intensity of power of a True Guru is incomprehensible.

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK eykmyk pl sMg rMg rs Aibgq giq siqgur inrbwn hY ]73]
lines.transliteration_english: Gursikh Aykamayk Pal Sang Rang Rasa , Abigat Gati Satigur Nirabaan Hai ?73?

Shabad OS B.translation: The company of a person for a second, who is deep into the meditation of Lord's name bless one with happiness, ecstasy and elixir of life. Like indestructible Lord, Satguru  is an epitome of eternal bliss. (73)
